# this is the build file for project Traject
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(Traject VERSION 1.0.0 LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(traject "")
set_target_properties(traject PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "traject")
set_target_properties(traject PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../build/mingw/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(traject PRIVATE
    ../fast_io_readwriterevamp/include
)
target_compile_options(traject PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-flto>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-rtti>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fno-rtti>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fomit-frame-pointer>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fomit-frame-pointer>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-exceptions>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fno-exceptions>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-unwind-tables>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fno-unwind-tables>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-asynchronous-unwind-tables>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fno-asynchronous-unwind-tables>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-static-libstdc++>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-static-libstdc++>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-static>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-static>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-flto>
)
set_target_properties(traject PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(traject PRIVATE c_std_11)
set_target_properties(traject PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(traject PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(traject PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(traject PRIVATE -Ofast)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(traject PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET traject PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(traject PRIVATE
    ntdll
)
target_link_options(traject PRIVATE
    -m64
    -flto
    -Ofast
)
target_sources(traject PRIVATE
    ../traject/windows/set_native_console_cp.cpp
    ../traject/clpara/parameters/help.cpp
    ../traject/clpara/parameters/init.cpp
    ../traject/clpara/parameters/version.cpp
    ../traject/main/main.cpp
)
